products.name: Sony 60" 1080p LED Smart TV (KDL60R510A) - Black Gloss
products.shortDescription: Enjoy an incredible big screen picture in any room in your house with this Sony 60" KDL60R510A LED TV. Boasting Full HD 1080p resolution for amazing, lifelike images and convenient, quick access to all your favourite content, this TV is the perfect addition to your home theatre experience.

products.name: Google Chromecast
products.shortDescription: Everything you love, now on your TV. Chromecast is the easy way to enjoy online video and music on your TV. It's a thumb-sized media streaming device that plugs into the HDMI  port on your TV. Set it up with a simple mobile app, then send your favourite online shows, movies, music and more to your TV using your smartphone, tablet or laptop.

products.name: LG 40" 4K Ultra HD 120Hz LED Smart TV (40UB8000) - Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy your favourite shows, movies and video games in amazing Ultra HD quality with the LG 40UB8000 40" 4K TV. UHD picture quality offers four times the resolution of 1080p Full HD, while upscaling technology enhances whatever you're watching to near-Ultra HD quality. WiFi connectivity offers convenient access to premium online content.

products.name: LG 50" 1080p 120Hz LED TV - Silver (50LB5900)
products.shortDescription: Enjoy clear, beautiful visuals with stunning colour quality and enriched detail with the LG LB5900 50-inch TV.  With Full HD 1080p resolution, your HD channels and Blu-ray movies look lifelike, while Motion Clarity Index 240 ensures fast-moving action films, video games or sports appear crystal clear.

products.name: Samsung 55" 1080p 120Hz LED Smart TV (UN55H6350AFXZC) - Black
products.shortDescription: Be smart about how you spend your spare time. With this 55" Samsung Smart TV at the hub of your home entertainment system, you've got the world of entertainment on lock. Access apps, social accounts, online content and all your device files through a streamlined and powerful quad-core system that wirelessly drives your content to display in 1080p.

products.name: Samsung 290W Sound Bar with Wireless Subwoofer (HW-H430/ZC)
products.shortDescription: Sporting 290 watts of vibrant, reverberating sound, the wall-mountable Samsung H430 sound bar connects seamlessly with your Samsung TV. Bluetooth wireless technology, coupled with Samsung's TV SoundConnect, lets you wirelessly connect your smartphone and your television straight into the sound bar.

products.name: Samsung 50" 4K Ultra HD 60Hz LED Smart TV (UN50HU6830AFXZC)
products.shortDescription: This 50" Samsung HU6830 4K UHD TV will boost your home-cinema viewing experience. Proprietary upscaling technology and a unique 4-step process gives Full HD, HD, and lower resolution content  stunning, UHD-like clarity. The combination of a powerful quad-core processor and smart capabilities allows you to watch live TV and browse the web at the same time.

products.name: Samsung 55" 4K Ultra HD 120Hz Curved LED Smart TV (UN55HU7250FXZC) - Black
products.shortDescription: Watch cinema-quality graphics at the comfort of your own home with the Samsung 55-inch 55HU7250F curved UHD TV. The curved design delivers better viewing angles, and with 4K resolution, every scene comes to life. Follow fast-action shots closely thanks to a 960 Clear Motion Rate that ensures quick motion appears clear and detailed.

products.name: Dynex 50" 1080p 60Hz LED TV (DX-50D510NA15) - Black
products.shortDescription: Create a cinematic experience right at home with a Dynex DLED television. Rich and vibrant colours, deep black and vivid whites ensure your sports, music videos and Blu-ray movies display in lifelike Full HD crystal clarity, while an array of connectivity options including USB and HDMI help you expand and enhance your home theatre capabilities.

products.name: LG 47" 1080p 120Hz LED Smart TV (47LB5830) - Silver
products.shortDescription: Enjoy clear, beautiful visuals with stunning colour quality and enriched detail with this LG 47-inch Smart TV.  With Full HD 1080p resolution, every scene looks lifelike, while Motion Clarity Index 240 ensures fast-moving action films, video games or sports appear crystal clear.

products.name: Samsung 40" 1080p 60Hz LED TV (UN40H5003AFXZC) - Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy clarity, convenience, and connectivity from the Samsung 40" UN40H5003. This LED TV offers bright colours, sharp images, incredible clarity, and, thanks to the ConnectShare Movie feature, lets you enjoy music, movies, and videos in Full HD 1080p resolution.

products.name: Dynex 40" 1080p 60Hz LED TV (DX-40D510NA15) - Black
products.shortDescription: Create a cinematic experience right at home with a Dynex DLED television. Full HD with rich and vibrant colours, deep blacks and vivid whites ensure your sports, music videos and Blu-ray movies display in lifelike crystal clarity, while an array of connectivity options including USB and HDMI help you expand and enhance your home theatre capabilities.

products.name: Insignia 40" 1080p 60Hz LED TV (NS-40D510NA15) - Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy big sights and sounds in your own home thanks to the Insignia 40" DLED Full HD television. Its 40-inch screen will bring every movie, TV show, and gaming excursion to life with bold, Full HD images that extend from corner to corner. Featuring a 1080p display, this TV will let you enjoy incredible resolution your high definition devices.

products.name: Samsung 58" 1080p 60Hz LED Smart TV (UN58H5202AFXZC) - Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy your favourite videos, music and photos on the big screen with the Samsung 58-inch 58H5202 LED TV. It offers Full HD image quality so your entertainment looks sharp and richly detailed. Simply plug in your USB or hard disk drive into the TV and display your multimedia in vivid detail.

products.name: Denon 525-Watt 7.2 Channel 4K HD Network Home Theatre Reciever (AVRS700W)
products.shortDescription: Give your home entertainment experience a boost with the Denon AVRS700 7.2 network AV receiver. Seven channels each provide 165 watts of power, while built-in WiFi allows you to connect to your home network. With 4K Ultra HD pass-through, this receiver is ideal for enjoying entertainment with a high-end home theatre setup.

products.name: Dynex 32" 720p 60Hz LED TV (DX-32D310NA15)
products.shortDescription: Enjoy HD quality images whether you're watching broadcast TV or sharing your favourite vacation videos and photos with this Dynex 32-inch HD D-LED TV. With a 60Hz refresh rate, fast-moving scenes look less blurry, and everyone watching gets to take in every smile and awed expression with a 178-degree viewing angle.

products.name: Sony 48" 1080p 60Hz LED TV (KDL48R470B) - Black Gloss
products.shortDescription: Display epic photos and videos captured on your mobile device on a bigger Full HD screen with this Sony 48" 1080p LED TV. This TV makes it easy to connect to your Android or iOS device, and play digital content without needing a network. It's equipped with MHL connectivity, and a multi-format USB port for playing a variety of video files.

products.name: Samsung 50" 1080p 120Hz LED Smart TV (UN50H6203) - Black
products.shortDescription: Enhance your home entertainment experience with the Samsung H6203 50" LED Smart TV. Enjoy crystal-clear images and amazing detail with Samsung's Clear Motion Rate technology that makes even the fastest action scenes sharp and free of blur. Easily access all of your favourite content with Samsung's Smart Hub and ConnectShare Movie.

products.name: Sharp 42" 1080p 120Hz LED TV (LC-42LB261U) - Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy your favourite movies and shows on this Sharp LC-42LB261U LED HDTV. This TV features a brilliant 42" Full HD display and 120Hz refresh rate to reduce blur during action scenes or sports. This TV has plenty of connectivity options for all your home theatre and gaming peripherals.

products.name: LG 65" 4K Ultra HD 240Hz IPS Smart TV (65UB9200) - Titan Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy your favourite shows, movies and video games in amazing Ultra HD quality with the LG 65UB9200 65" 4K TV. UHD picture quality offers four times the resolution of 1080p Full HD, while the IPS panel offers a wider viewing angle so you get brilliant display no matter where you're sitting. WiFi connectivity makes it easy to access online content.

products.name: Samsung 55" 1080p 120Hz LED Smart TV (UN55H6203) - Black
products.shortDescription: Enhance your home entertainment experience with the Samsung H6203 55" LED Smart TV. Enjoy crystal-clear images and amazing detail with Samsung's Clear Motion Rate technology that makes even the fastest action scenes sharp and free of blur. Easily access all of your favourite content with Samsung's Smart Hub and ConnectShare Movie.

products.name: Sony 50" 1080p 120Hz 3D LED Smart TV (KDL50W790B) - Black
products.shortDescription: Spend your spare time wisely by investing in a Sony Smart TV that gets you the most out of your entertainment. Not only can you watch favourite Blu-ray and 3D movies in vibrant, immersive HD, but get access to even more content via Netflix, WiFi, and an array of other connectivity options that allow playback from PCs, smartphones, USB and more.

products.name: VIZIO 42" 1080p 240Hz LED Smart TV (M422i-B1) - Black
products.shortDescription: Prepare to be blown away by the VIZIO M422i-B1 42" LED HDTV. You'll love the 1080p display, 240Hz refresh rate and Clear Action 720 technology for incredibly clear images during even the more fast-action scenes. VIZIO Internet Apps Plus and built-in Wi-Fi let you stream media, too.

products.name: Samsung 40" 1080p 60Hz LED Smart TV (UN40H5203) - Black
products.shortDescription: Get the ultimate home entertainment experience with the Samsung 40" H5203. This Smart TV features Full HD 1080p to deliver bold, exciting visuals that will keep you hooked, plus Internet connectivity that keeps you within arms' reach of web content and apps.

products.name: VIZIO 50" 1080p 240Hz LED Smart TV (M502i-B1) - Black
products.shortDescription: VIZIO M502I-B1 50" LED HDTV features 32 active LED zones that dynamically adjust the backlight per zone, creating deep, pure black levels and high contrast. You'll love the built-in Wi-Fi and Internet Apps Plus allow you to wirelessly stream movies, shows and music.

products.name: LG 32" 720p 60Hz LED TV (32LB520B) - Black
products.shortDescription: Perfect for bedrooms and other small spaces, the LG LB520B 32" LED TV delivers a compact, stylish design to any room in your house. The Motion Clarity Index of 120 means that fast-moving scenes like sports, games and action movies will look crystal clear with virtually no motion blur.

products.name: LG Blu-ray Disc Player (BP145)
products.shortDescription: Enjoy all your favourite content in stunning Full HD using the LG Blu-ray Disc Player. Upscaled DVD and Blu-ray discs appear with clarity and vibrancy in 1080p resolution, while USB connectivity lets you quickly and easily stream content from jump or hard drives, without the use of a PC.

products.name: VIZIO 50" 1080p 120Hz LED Smart TV (E500i-B1) - Black
products.shortDescription: Experience entertainment like you've never seen it outside the cinema with a Smart HDTV from VIZIO. 16 active LED zones drive superior light uniformity that allows for deeper blacks, brighter colour and more vibrant picture. WiFi and full web browsing capabilities expand your scope of media possibilities and let you do more on the big screen.

products.name: Sony 55" 1080p 120Hz 3D LED Smart TV (KDL55W790B) - Black
products.shortDescription: Movies, games, and other entertainment will look amazing on the Sony KDL55W790B 55" 3D LED Smart TV. Boasting Full HD resolution, Motionflow XR 240, and X-Reality Pro, this TV brings your entertainment to lifelike detail. Built-in WiFi opens up a world of entertainment, while 3D video support can make compatible content leap to life.

products.name: Sony 32" 720p LED TV (KDL32R300B) - Black Gloss
products.shortDescription: Boasting a realistic, immersive 32" display with HD 720p resolution, this Sony KDL32R300B LED LCD HDTV is the perfect addition to any space in your room. Enjoy your favourite content in any room the way that it was meant to be experienced thanks to the Clear Resolution Enhancer picture engine.

products.name: Sharp 50" 1080p 120Hz LED TV (LC-50LB261U) - Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy your favourite movies and shows on this Sharp LC-50LB261U LED HDTV. This TV features a brilliant 50" Full HD display and 120Hz refresh rate to reduce blur during action scenes or sports. This TV has plenty of connectivity options for all your home theatre and gaming peripherals.

products.name: Sony 48" 1080p 60Hz LED Smart TV (KDL48W600B) - Black
products.shortDescription: Go beyond ordinary with the Sony KDL48W600B 48" LED Smart TV. Boasting a Full HD display powered by X-Reality Pro, this TV produces crystal-clear, lifelike images. Built-in WiFi opens up a world of entertainment through the Sony Entertainment Network, while wireless screen mirroring can bring your smartphone contents to the big screen.
